LanguageData.ZP_MugiwaraBosi.label: Straw hat
LanguageData.ZP_MugiwaraBosi.description: A hat knitted with straw. It is used as a sunshade during farm work.
LanguageData.ZP_Sugekasa.label: Sugekasa
LanguageData.ZP_Sugekasa.description: Straw woven kasa(hat), was worn by samurais, ninjas, monks , ronins , traders and farmers in old-eastern-world, can be used to shelter from the sunshine, rain falls, even snowy.
LanguageData.ZP_Tengai.label: Tengai
LanguageData.ZP_Tengai.description: A fully covered helmet, woven by straw. Has religious means. However, when you wearing it, your face is out of sight, so it gives others a creepy feeling.
LanguageData.ZP_HeadBand.label: Hatigane
LanguageData.ZP_HeadBand.description: Simple head equipment that does not block visibility. This is put the metal in the forehead part so that the forehead is not broken.
LanguageData.ZP_JingasaHelmet.label: Jingasa Helmet
LanguageData.ZP_JingasaHelmet.description: A Jingasa(helmet) to protect the head of Ashigaru(soldier).
LanguageData.ZP_SyougunHelmet.label: Kabuto Helmet
LanguageData.ZP_SyougunHelmet.description: A Kabuto(helmet) that was only allowed to be worn by the Syogun(general). Have a strong spirit as Syogun(general).
LanguageData.ZP_Warazi.label: Warazi Shoes
LanguageData.ZP_Warazi.description: Japanese traditional footwear made of straw. It fits the feet and makes the movement comfortable.
LanguageData.ZP_WoodenClogs.label: Geta
LanguageData.ZP_WoodenClogs.description: Japanese traditional footwear made of woodLog. It fits the feet and makes the movement comfortable.
LanguageData.ZP_IronClogs.label: Steel Geta
LanguageData.ZP_IronClogs.description: A kind og Geta made of steel for forking legs transmitted from old times.Although the moving speed drops by 50%, it is possible to gain a lot of experience value by gifts of gut and training.
LanguageData.ZP_TravelBag.label: Tourists' bag
LanguageData.ZP_TravelBag.description: A traditional Japanese travel bag. It is convenient to transport as it can hold lots of luggage.
LanguageData.ZP_Tekko.label: Tekko
LanguageData.ZP_Tekko.description: Protective hands to prevent dirt and trauma during blacksmithing etc.
